name: Shotgun Farmers
detailed_description:
Shotgun Farmers is the online multiplayer shooter where your bullets grow the guns. Harvest weapon plants quickly for more ammo or let them grow for a larger clip. Aim carefully, as a missed shot means you've just gifted your enemy with the gun you're using!




  • Online Multiplayer Shooter for up to 12 players!
  • No reload means you have to grow your ammo! Shot by a sniper? Well they just planted you your very own sniper gun to fire back with!
  • Fight with 5 different vegetable weapons, with more on the way.
  • Customize your farmer with unlockable hats!
  • Team Deathmatch, Free For All, Oddball, and King of the Hill game modes.
  • Battle across 5 farms, the Countryside, Riverside, Roadside, Graveside and Westside.
  • Customizable room options and password protected games.
  • More maps, weapons, and game modes coming soon!


Weapon plants grow from the bullets that hit the ground. The longer a plant grows, the more ammo it will have.










Since Day 1, Shotgun Farmers has been developed live on Twitch with ideas and feedback from the community. Join us on stream at: http://twitch.tv/qazitv

Looking for a match? Join the Shotgun Farmers community on Discord! https://discord.gg/j3PrESH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 or better with 768 MB+ of VRAM (DirectX 11 Compatible)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
